name: CrunchTime!
description:
CrunchTime! is a tense, real-time based game where you have to complete the revision of a project at your company before the one-week deadline passes you up. However, you must also manage your mental health. Make sure you take those breaks, otherwise the quality of your work may suffer. Will you get 'revised' up to a new position? Or will you get 'revised' off the company roster?

Controls: 

click elements on screen

spacebar to accept
